title: Be Mindful Of The Words You Speak | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Be Mindful Of The Words You Speak | Victoria Osteen
description:
The words we speak have the power to set the course for our lives. When you practice speaking the Word of God, you're preparing yourself for the blessings He has in store!

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
